content: the court of appeals in naples has issued a final ruling on a case that lasted for 6 years they declared default for several individuals involved in the case and upheld the appeal the court ordered the division of inheritance assets including a building an apartment and a garden they also ordered reimbursement for maintenance expenses incurred for the building the court determined the amounts to be paid to the heirs based on their shares in the inheritance they addressed the enjoyment of a specific room in the building and allocated the payment of annuities to the heirs the court considered court costs and determined they should be shared among the parties involved the court has made a final ruling assigned property awarded monetary compensation determined payments for the use of certain rooms and allocated costs and fees the decision was made in naples on april 18 2023 and filed in the secretarys office on may 17 2023
